post.description: Creates a new user with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users. Supports filtering by email, role, and status.
get.summary: List users with pagination and filters

get.description: Fetches the details of a specific user identified by their UUID.

patch.description: Updates the details of an existing user.

post.description: Sets the user status to active.
Sets the user status to disabled.
Authenticates a user with email and password. On success, creates a new session, sets an HTTP-only refresh token cookie, and returns a short-lived access token.

200.description: Login successful. Access token returned in body, refresh token set in cookie.

post.description: Uses a valid refresh token cookie to issue a new access token. Rotates the refresh token to maintain session security and extends the session validity.

200.description: Refresh successful. New access token returned in body, new refresh token set in cookie.

get.description: Retrieves the profile information (User ID, Email, Role) of the currently authenticated user based on the valid access token.

post.description: Creates a new client record in the system using the provided name and slug. Returns the created client details.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of clients. Supports `page` and `limit` query parameters. Returns client data along with pagination metadata.
Fetches the details of a specific client identified by their UUID.

patch.description: Updates the details of an existing client. Only provided fields are updated. Automatically updates the `updatedAt` timestamp.

post.description: Registers a new webhook endpoint for a client to receive event notifications.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of registered webhook endpoints for the authenticated client.
Fetches configuration details for a specific webhook endpoint.

patch.description: Modifies settings for an existing webhook endpoint, such as the target URL or active status.

post.description: Accepts a new event payload and processes it for distribution to relevant webhook subscriptions.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated log of events that have been ingested into the system.
Retrieves the full payload and metadata for a specific event.
Fetches a paginated history of webhook delivery attempts, including status and timestamps.

parameters.name: webhookEventId
parameters.description: Filter by specific webhook event ID

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific webhook delivery attempt.
Retrieves a paginated list of failed webhook deliveries currently in the Dead Letter Queue.

parameters.name: webhookEventId
parameters.description: Filter by specific webhook event ID

post.description: Manually triggers a retry for a specific failed webhook delivery from the Dead Letter Queue.

get.description: Fetches details of a specific failed delivery record from the Dead Letter Queue.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user

updatedAt.description: When the user was last updated

password.description: The user's password (min 8 chars, 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number)

path.description: Path to the field that failed validation

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user

role.description: The role of the user (e.g. admin, user)

email.description: The email address of the user

createdAt.description: Date when the client was created

updatedAt.description: Date when the client was last updated

clientId.description: The ID of the client owning this webhook

endpointName.description: A descriptive name for the endpoint (e.g. 'Order Created')

targetUrl.description: The URL to send the webhook payload to

clientId.description: ID of the client owning this webhook

targetUrl.description: The URL to send the webhook payload to

clientId.description: The ID of the client owning this webhook

endpointName.description: A descriptive name for the endpoint (e.g. 'Order Created')

targetUrl.description: The URL to send the webhook payload to

webhookEventId.description: Unique identifier for the webhook event

initiatorId.description: ID of the user initiating the replay
